name: aws-photo-share-infrastructure
description: AWS CDK Infrastructure for Photo Sharing App

scripts.build:lambdas: cd ../lambdas/photo-api && npm run build && cd ../thumbnail && npm run build && cd ../image-processor && npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:lambdas && npm run build
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:all && cdk deploy --profile photoapp-dev --context environment=dev --no-rollback
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:all && cdk deploy --profile photoapp-prod --context environment=prod --no-rollback
scripts.dev: npm run smart-build && cdk deploy --hotswap --outputs-file outputs.json --no-rollback
